src:
耶誕與AV女優同遊SOD總部　K罩杯優月真理奈準備好了
05 Nov 2019, 08:41 by 溫雅雯
喜愛成人AV的老司機們一定對SOD總部充滿好奇心， 這個每月出產數十部AV作品的成人產業品牌SOFT ON DEMAND（簡稱SOD），即將於11月15、16日與台灣「尻尻會社」舉辦「SOD女子社員酒場海外初派遣-台灣限定場」，參加活動的粉絲中，將抽取2名幸運兒親臨SOD總部內部，與女優共度一日女友行程。
看重台灣成人市場消費潛力，SOD以開放總部參觀來宣示進軍台灣市場的決心，除了端出史上最猛的耶誕禮物給台灣的粉絲外， SOD STAR的小泉ひなた（小泉日向）、 萌系小妖精葉月もえ（葉月萌）、K罩杯的優月まりな（優月真理奈）、H奶中文通的橘メアリー（橘瑪麗）也將性感出席「SOD女子社員酒場」活動，主辦單位尻尻會社更加碼推出「SOD女子社員見面會」、「與SOD女子社員CHECK INN」合宿企劃，尻尻會社VIP會員更有機會抽中免費與女優合宿的機會。
「與SOD女子社員CHECK INN」合宿企劃門票已一掃而空，目前「SOD女子社員酒場」及「SOD女子社員見面會」都還能選購，近日瘦身有成的橘メアリー（橘瑪麗）非常期待這次來台與粉絲互動，不斷地在個人社群媒體上展現性感的好身材，SOD STAR的小泉日向也拍了一段給台灣粉絲的話。


橘瑪麗可以用中文與粉絲簡單交流，不用擔心語言不通喔。（翻攝自橘瑪麗推特）

由於「SOD女子社員酒場-台灣限定場」也有提供非酒精類飲料，就算不喝酒的朋友也能放心報名，更歡迎11月滿18歲的年輕朋友，一起來見證SOD的成人文化。AV女優陪你現場打卡轉大人，上最猛耶誕禮物，送粉絲去SOD總部和女優過耶誕得獎名單，將於11月25日抽出，請鎖定尻尻會社官網公告。

★鏡週刊關心您：未滿18歲禁止飲酒，飲酒過量害人害己，酒後不開車，安全有保障。

更新時間｜2019.11.05 09:16
text:
Christmas and AV actress travel with SOD headquarters K cup Yuyue Zhennai is ready
05 Nov 2019, 08:41 by Wen Yawen
The old drivers who love adult AV must be curious about the SOD headquarters. This adult industry brand SOFT ON DEMAND (SOD), which produces dozens of AV works per month, will be held on November 15 and 16 in Taiwan. "The SOD Women's Club Winery's Overseas Dispatch-Taiwan Limited Field" will be held. Among the fans participating in the event, two lucky ones will be invited to visit the SOD headquarters to spend a day with the actress.
Focusing on the consumption potential of Taiwan's adult market, SOD is determined to open its headquarters to declare its willingness to enter the Taiwan market. In addition to the most fierce Christmas gift to Taiwan fans, SOD STAR's Koizumi (Koizumi) and Meng Leprechaun Ye Yuezhen (Ye Yuemeng), K-Cup of Yuyue Yu (Yuyue Shinai), and H-Middle Chinese-Traditional Tangerine (Orange Mary) will also participate in the "SOD Women's Club Winery" event. The organizer will launch the event. "SOD Women's Club Meetup Meeting" and "SOD Women's Member CHECK INN" are combined to plan, and VIP members of the club will have the opportunity to take advantage of free and female friends.
Tickets for the "SOD Women's Club CHECK INN" have been swept away. At present, "SOD Women's Club Winery" and "SOD Women's Club Meetups" can be purchased. Recently, the slimming orange メアリー (Orange Mary) is looking forward to it. This time, I came to Taiwan to interact with my fans and constantly showed sexy and good body in the personal social media. SOD STAR's Koizumi also took a picture for Taiwanese fans.


Orange Mary can communicate with fans in Chinese without worrying about language. (Reflected from Orange Mary Twitter)

Since the "SOD Women's Club Winery - Taiwan Limited Site" also provides non-alcoholic beverages, even those who do not drink can register with confidence, and welcome young friends who are 18 years old in November to witness the adult culture of SOD. AV actress will accompany you on the spot to transfer to the adults, the most fierce Christmas gift, send fans to the SOD headquarters and the female superiors to the Christmas prize list, will be drawn out on November 25, please lock the official website announcement.

★ Mirror Weekly cares about you: It is forbidden to drink alcohol under the age of 18, drinking too much harm to others, not driving after drinking, safe and secure.
